name: PUPPETZ
description:
A game made during the Playmaker Game Jam 2020.

Shoot off bodyparts from people that are getting flung up from below. Match the missing body part on the puppet and fill up the tube before the timer runs out!

Each bar filled on the tube gives you 10 extra seconds. Win by filling up the tube.

I took the game jam theme VERY literally. The people get flung up "from below".


W+S to go up and down.
Mouse to shoot.

Made with Unity, Playmaker, Aseprite and Cubase.

By Herman Wahlgren
